item.title: *UPDATED[TuT]Hide and seek(npc) MINIGAME[TuT][Delta][317]
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

[quote=“Danielplanto, post:42, topic:350649”]replace what you have with this

if(isInWR() && PlayerHandler.hswait == 1){ PlayerHandler.hsnpc = 0; PlayerHandler.npchs = 0; isInHS(); reseths(); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(131, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(132, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(131, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(132, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(131, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(132, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(131, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(132, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(131, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(132, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); toX = 2424 + misc.random(1); toY = 3094 + misc.random(3); sM("@gre@GO!"); heightLevel -= 1; } if(PlayerHandler.hsnpc == 5 && isInHS() && PlayerHandler.npchs == 5){ toX = 3097; toY = 3495; reseths(); sM("Hide and Seek is over! You now have "+hspoints+" points!"); ResetAttackNPC(); refreshSkills(); PlayerHandler.hswait = 20; } in client.java, at your error spots.[/quote]
thanks so much all errors fixed now but when i enter the portal into the waiting room the timer counts down but it does not teleport you when timer hits 0 it just keeps repeating

Read full topic

@Danielplanto wrote:

replace what you have with this

if(isInWR() && PlayerHandler.hswait == 1){ PlayerHandler.hsnpc = 0; PlayerHandler.npchs = 0; isInHS(); reseths(); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(131, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(132, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(131, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(132, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(131, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(132, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(131, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(132, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(131, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(132, 2384 + misc.random(29), 3072 + misc.random(62),0); toX = 2424 + misc.random(1); toY = 3094 + misc.random(3); sM("@gre@GO!"); heightLevel -= 1; } if(PlayerHandler.hsnpc == 5 && isInHS() && PlayerHandler.npchs == 5){ toX = 3097; toY = 3495; reseths(); sM("Hide and Seek is over! You now have "+hspoints+" points!"); ResetAttackNPC(); refreshSkills(); PlayerHandler.hswait = 20; } in client.java, at your error spots.
